title: Cherry Alley Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe with many vegetarian and vegan options including tofu and tempeh wraps, grilled veggie paninis, tofu scramble, and soymilk for coffee. Staff knows what vegan means and are helpful. Uses local produce as much as possible and has a special international themed dinner on weekends. Live music Fri and Sat nights featuring local musicians. Local artists' artwork on displayed on walls.
